title: THE BEST OF THE DAN PATRICK SHOW
itunes:title: THE BEST OF THE DAN PATRICK SHOW
description:
On the Friday edition of The Best Of The Dan Patrick Show: With Doug and Jason filling in for Dan, they talk about the Kevin Durant requested trade from the Brooklyn Nets and how it got to this point.  

Former NBA Player and college head coach Rex Walters joins Doug and Jason to talk about the Kevin Durant drama in Brooklyn, the major moves in the NBA thus far, and the other major headlines playing out in the NBA right now.

With Doug and Jason filling in for Dan, the guys talk about how much of a titanic land-shift the USC/UCLA move to the Big Ten is.  

#jss #DougGottliebShow

 

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
